entities.text: annually elected committee of nine persons
entities.label: GROUPINGS

entities.text: The African Company of Merchants was established under the terms of An Act for extending and improving trade to Africa, 1750.
entities.label: RELATIONSHIPS

entities.text: The Company's affairs were managed by by an annually elected committee of nine persons which met in London.
entities.label: RELATIONSHIPS

entities.text: Freedom (membership) of the Company was available to any merchant paying a fee of 40/- to the Chamberlain of the City of London, the Clerk of the Merchant's Hall, Bristol or the Town Clerk of Liverpool.
entities.label: RELATIONSHIPS
